summary: A mathematician is someone who studies mathematics, either as a hobby or as a job.
full_text:
The American Physical Society  is the world's largest organization of physicists. The Society publishes more than a dozen scientific journals, including the prestigious Physical Review and Physical Review Letters, and organizes more than twenty science meetings each year. APS is a member society of the American Institute of Physics.
^ "AIP member societies". Aip.org. Retrieved 2011-12-06.
title: American Physical Society
